personal.name: Thomas Bishop
personal.address: Flat 5D London House, 85 London Road, High Wycombe, HP11 1BN
personal.bio: I am an enthusiastic professional individual who is seeking a new challenge during my time at university. I am a hard-working individual who strives to achieve the best in all areas, and I am always eager to learn new skills.

skills.skill: Proficient User of Adobe Programs, predominantly Photoshop & Illustrator
Advanced understanding of both HTML & CSS
Dedicated, motivated and always on task
Passion for working in fast-paced environments
A strong desire to learn and grow within a company

role.title: Consultancy Role
role.description: Edit the core Shopify Theme to meet the companies design specifications.
Assisted in managing the social media channels
Assisted in running social media campaigns

role.title: UX Manager
role.description: Launched the websites of 2 sub-brands on a Shopify Platform
Managed a team of 3 people in the upload and merchandising of new product lines
First POC with the companies Magento Agency for all website changes & produced wireframes where necessary
Provided training & support for new starters

role.title: E-commerce Assisstant
role.description: Assisted in the upload and merchandising of all new product lines.
Designed & Issued Marketing Emails via MailChimp.
Created custom web pages using HTML, CSS & Java

online.award: Codeacademy Pro Intensive Built Front-End Web Apps from Scratch Certification
Codeacademy Pro Intensive Built Websites from Scratch Certification

hobbies.hobby: As a keen athlete, I spend a lot of my free time in the gym and took part in the 2017 London Marathon. I’m also an avid Formula 1 fan and have travelled the world following the sport.

example.name: Nujo Skin
example.overview: Nujo Skin is a UK based cosmetics company that specialises in providing 100% natural products that help reduce fine lines and wrinkles.

example.name: Jammming
example.overview: Jammming is an online web application that allows you to search over 4 million songs. Enabling you to create the playlist you want and save it to your Spotify account at the click of a button.
